name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch create-api-products-using-scs-and-ep.md --exec "claat export -o temp/ create-api-products-using-scs-and-ep.md && ./node_modules/kill-port/cli.js --port 9090 && cd temp/create-api-products-using-scs-and-ep && claat serve"
